title: masterolive
author: masterolive
content: Don't take yourself too seriously, have a Pocket Dot!Pocket dots are a set of 500 silly dots with varying expressions and background colors that remind you to smile every day. There are some rare pocket dots, and there is one ultra-rare pocket dot (#100) themed to a videogame character (but that's a secret).I created a youtube channel called: "Pocket Dot Music", where popular songs attributed to the song artists will be re-uploaded with the pocket dot NFTs switching through all types to the beat of the music at random order for each video. In the video specifically, the NFT number will be listed in the bottom left-hand corner that correlates with the NFT number on opensea for viewers to see and search for, or where owners' NFTs are represented in the song.Here is our first video as an example: https://youtu.be/4DTziBJdt00There is no presale whitelist and the launch will be open to public minting on 06/17/2021 on the website: https://pocketnft.artThere is a maximum supply of 500 dots.The mint price is set to 1.0 PolygonContract address: 0x7014aA29848F76151534f5D40447EA8650447D25Social media details:Twitter: https://twitter.com/pocket_dotInstagram:https://www.instagram.com/pocket_dotnft/Discord DM: Masterolive#8763Let me know if you have any questions, and thanks for reading this far!
